author: Elizabeth Landers, CNN
description: First lady Melania Trump's fashion choices got rave reviews in local Saudi Arabian press Sunday, despite forgoing the customary headscarf.
title: Melania Trump gets rave reviews in Saudi press

author: Aileen Graef and Kate Bennett
description: First lady Melania Trump and first daughter Ivanka Trump arrived in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, Saturday morning sporting an absence of headscarves.
title: Melania and Ivanka Trump arrive in Saudi Arabia sans headscarves

author: Kristina Wong
description: First lady Melania Trump and first daughter Ivanka Trump made headlines when they arrived Saturday morning in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia sans headscarves.
title: Melania and Ivanka Trump Forego Headscarves in Saudi Arabia - Breitbart

author: Charlie Spiering
description: Americans buzzed over Melania Trump’s decision not to wear a headscarf in Saudi Arabia. In Saudi Arabia, the Arab News newspaper honored her.
title: Arab News: Melania Trump ‘Classy and Conservative’ In Saudi Arabia

description: Melania and Ivanka Trump both arrived in Saudi Arabia on Saturday without their heads covered - two years after Donald Trump criticised Michelle Obama for doing the same thing.
title: Melania Trump arrives in Saudi Arabia without headscarf - two years after Donald criticised Michelle Obama for showing her hair

description: RIYADH, Saudi Arabia (AP) — Ignoring President Donald Trump's past admonition, U.S. first lady Melania Trump did not cover her head Saturday when they arrived in Saudi Arabia on the opening leg of his first international tour since taking office. Two years ago, then-citizen Trump criticized then-first lady Michelle Obama's decision to go bare-headed on a January 2015 visit with her husband. "Many people are saying it was wonderful that Mrs. Obama refused to wear a scarf in Saudi Arabia, but they were insulted. We have enuf enemies," Trump tweeted at the time, including a short-hand spelling for "enough."
title: In Saudi Arabia, Melania Trump opts to keep her head bare

author: Rachel Roberts
description: As Donald Trump  delivered a key speech in front of heads of state in the strict Islamic Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, his wife and daughter Melania and Ivanka Trump both appeared without headscarves, even though the US President previously criticised former first lady Michelle Obama for doing the same thing.
title: Melania arrives at Trump speech on Islam without headscarf in rejection of strict dress code

description: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia (AP) -- Accompanying her husband on his first international trip, U.S. first lady Melania Trump on Saturday stepped off of Air Force One conservatively dressed in long sleeves and pants to conform to the strict dress code that Saudi Arabia enforces for its female citizens. But one thing was missing from her black and gold-belted ensemble: a head scarf.
title: Melania Trump Skips Headscarf as She Arrives in Saudi Arabia

author: Charlie Spiering
description: President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump arrived in Saudi Arabia, personally greeted at the airport by King Salman.
title: Donald Trump Arrives In Saudi Arabia - Breitbart

author: Spiegel Online
description: Ankunft in Riad: Seine erste Auslandsreise führt Donald Trump nach Saudi-Arabien, am Samstagmorgen deutscher Zeit stieg er dort mit First Lady Melania aus der Air Force One.
title: Riad-Besuch in Bildern: Donald Trump trifft König Salman
